deductions.formula:
(0 if base/12 <= 15000 and custom_state == "Karnataka" else
200 if custom_state == "Karnataka" else 0)

(0 if base/12 <= 5999 and custom_state == "Gujarat" else 
80 if 6000 <= base/12 <= 8999 and custom_state == "Gujarat" else 
150 if 9000 <= base/12 <= 11999 and custom_state == "Gujarat" else
200)

(0 if (gender == 'Male' and base/12 <= 7500) or (gender == 'Female' and base/12 <= 10000) else
175 if (gender == 'Male' and 7500 < base/12 <= 10000) else 
300 if getdate(start_date).month == 2 else 200) if custom_state == "Maharashtra" else 0

(0 if base/12 < 15000 else
150 if 15000 <= base/12 < 20000 else
200) if custom_state=="Andra Pradesh" else 0

(0 if base/12 <= 10000 and custom_state == "West Bengal" else 
110 if 10001 <= base/12 <= 15000 and custom_state == "West Bengal" else 
130 if 15001 <= base/12 <= 25000 and custom_state == "West Bengal" else 
150 if 25001 <= base/12 <= 40000 and custom_state == "West Bengal" else 
200 if custom_state == "West Bengal" else 0)

earnings.formula: custom_uniform_allowance_value/12 if custom_uniform_allowance_value <= 15000 and custom_is_uniform_allowance  else 0
custom_medical_allowance_value/12 if custom_medical_allowance_value <= 15000 and custom_is_medical_allowance else 0

(base/12)-(base/12 *.35)-((base/12 *.35) * 1 if base <= 515000
 else ((base/12 *.35) * 0.5 if (base/12 *.35) < 20000 and base <= 1000000 
       else 20000 if (base/12 *.35) >= 20000 and base <= 1000000 
       else 25000 if 1000001 < base <= 1700000
       else (base/12 *.35) * 0.5 if 1700001 < base <= 99999999 
       else (base/12 *.35)))-((1000 if base <= 180000  
       else 1750 if 180001 <= base <= 300000 
       else 3500 if 300001 <= base <= 350000 
       else 3500 if 350001 <= base <= 500000 
       else 3500 if 500001 <= base <= 515000 
       else 5000 if 515001 <= base <= 600000
       else 5000 if 600001 <= base <= 700000 
       else 5000 if 700001 <= base <= 750000 
       else 8000 if 750001 <= base <= 850000 
       else 12000 if 850001 <= base <= 1000000
       else 12000 if 1000001 <= base <= 1500000
       else 15000 if 1500001 <= base <= 1700000 
       else 15000 if 1700001 <= base <= 2000000 
       else 20000 if 2000001 <= base <= 99999999 
       else base) if custom_is_car_petrol_lta==0 else 0)-((base * 0.35)/12 * .12 if custom_is_epf else 0)-((base * 0.35)/12 * 0.2)-(custom_uniform_allowance_value/12 if custom_uniform_allowance_value <= 15000 and custom_is_uniform_allowance  else 0)-(custom_medical_allowance_value/12 if custom_medical_allowance_value <= 15000 and custom_is_medical_allowance else 0)-(((base * 0.35)/12 * custom_nps_percentage)/100 if custom_is_nps else 0)-(2000 if base > 1000000 and custom_is_food_coupon else 0)-custom_statistical_amount

custom_medical_allowance_value/12 if custom_medical_allowance_value <= 15000 and custom_is_medical_allowance else 0

(base/12)-(base/12 *.35)-((base/12 *.35) * 1 if base <= 515000
 else ((base/12 *.35) * 0.5 if (base/12 *.35) < 20000 and base <= 1000000 
       else 20000 if (base/12 *.35) >= 20000 and base <= 1000000 
       else 25000 if 1000001 < base <= 1700000
       else (base/12 *.35) * 0.5 if 1700001 < base <= 99999999 
       else (base/12 *.35)))-((1000 if base <= 180000

       else 15000 if 1500001 <= base <= 1700000 
       else 15000 if 1700001 <= base <= 2000000 
       else 20000 if 2000001 <= base <= 99999999 
       else base) if custom_is_car_petrol_lta==0 else 0)-((base * 0.35)/12 * .12 if custom_is_epf else 0)-((base * 0.35)/12 * 0.2)-(custom_uniform_allowance_value/12 if custom_uniform_allowance_value <= 15000 and custom_is_uniform_allowance  else 0)-(custom_medical_allowance_value/12 if custom_medical_allowance_value <= 15000 and custom_is_medical_allowance else 0)-(((base * 0.35)/12 * custom_nps_percentage)/100 if custom_is_nps else 0)-(2000 if base > 1000000 and custom_is_food_coupon else 0)-custom_statistical_amount
